page.title: 06'LINK' Home Help Charity.
page.content: { 'Link'}is a charity organisation run by over{200 volunteers}who help people in need , without charge , by putting them in touch with organisations and volunteers. 'Link' has contacts with Social Services & Health Services, who can help in such ways as{visiting}(the disabled , aged & lonely.) ,{transport (for those who can't afford or don't have private transport ) , {home {emergencies} ( i.e. child minding , sitting with elderly relatives, etc.), {practical help }( for those who are less well off and need furniture, cots, beds, heaters, etc.). If you are faced with a{crisis}( e.g. a lonely neighbour's sudden illness ), 'Link' can for instance........ {***}--act as a contact point {***}--take over so you can go to work. Everyone in the locality gets a {directory}with details of 'Link'.
